title: The Proud Sweet Wife: President Gu, Please Lend me a Kiss - Novel Updates
tags: Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cheats   Clumsy Love Interests   Complex Family Relationships   Destiny   Domestic Affairs   Fallen Angels   Female Protagonist   Healers
author: Qing Rong   清容
description:
She was driven out by her father and betrayed by her sister and boyfriend, falling into an abyss of misery.

He had noble and mysterious status and his power could hardly be matched.

'Marry me and you will be Mrs. Gu envied by all!'

She had believed it was just trade satisfying both sides and never expected to lose her body and soul.

She felt painful all over and could no longer bear it:'Gu Yeze, we'd better have a divorce.'

In the shadow, he pressed her against the wall and said:'Wanna run away after getting me? Impossible!'
>
